name: mint_and_override_metadata
attributes: # [doc = " 1) `NftAccount` を初期化する（すでに初期化済みであっても再初期化可能）  "]
# [doc = " 2) NFT メタデータを上書きするが、account_matching を行わず任意のアカウントを読み書きしてしまう"]
body: { let mut raw = nft_acc . try_borrow_mut_data () ? ; raw [0] = 1 ; let bytes = initial_supply . to_le_bytes () ; for i in 0 .. 8 { raw [1 + i] = bytes [i] ; } msg ! ("[STEP1] nft_account を再初期化: supply = {}" , initial_supply) ; }

let mut stored_supply : u64 = { let raw = nft_acc . try_borrow_data () ? ; let mut b = [0u8 ; 8] ; b . copy_from_slice (& raw [1 .. 9]) ; let s = u64 :: from_le_bytes (b) ; msg ! ("[STEP2] stored_supply = {}" , s) ; s } ;
{ let mut raw_meta = metadata_acc . try_borrow_mut_data () ? ; for i in 0 .. 32 { raw_meta [i] = override_name [i] ; } msg ! ("[STEP3] metadata_account.name を {:?} に上書き" , override_name) ; }
{ * * nft_acc . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? -= fee ; * * fee_acc . try_borrow_mut_lamports () ? += fee ; msg ! ("[STEP4] 手数料 {} を fee_acc に送金" , fee) ; }

{ let mut raw = nft_acc . try_borrow_mut_data () ? ; let zero_bytes = 0u64 . to_le_bytes () ; for i in 0 .. 8 { raw [1 + i] = zero_bytes [i] ; } msg ! ("[STEP5] nft_account の stored_supply を 0 にリセット") ; }

fields.name: initialized
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 初期化フラグ: 0 = 未初期化, 1 = 初期化済み"]

fields.name: nft_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " AccountMatching をせず再初期化可能"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: metadata_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " NFT メタデータアカウント（owner / PDA チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: fee_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 手数料受取先（owner チェック省略）"] # [account (mut)]
